scripts.build:changed: npm run clear && lerna changed | while read package; do npx rollup -c --scope $package || exit 1; done
scripts.build: npm run clear && for dir in packages/*; do package=${dir#'packages/'}; if [[ $package = create-prpl ]]; then rollup -c --scope $package; else rollup -c --scope @prpl/$package; fi || exit 1; done
scripts.reset: npm run clear && rm -rf ./**/.cache && rm -rf ./**/node_modules && rm -rf ./package.lock && npm install
